Sentencas: Dense and thin electrolyte films are desirable for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) because of their low gas leakage and low ohmic resistances.
Titulo: Electrostatic Spray Deposition of Doped Ceria Films

Sentencas: This work aims at the preparation of thin dense Gd-doped ceria (CGO) electrolyte films using a cost-effective deposition method in ambient atmosphere-electrostatic spray deposition (ESD).
Titulo: Electrostatic Spray Deposition of Doped Ceria Films

Sentencas: The deposition parameters such as deposition temperature, concentration and flow rate of precursor solution were changed systematically to examine their effects on film morphology and hence electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Electrostatic Spray Deposition of Doped Ceria Films

Sentencas: While the film morphology was examined by a scanning electron microscope, the electrochemical performance was revealed by measuring open circuit voltages (OCVs) of NiO-CGO/CGO/Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (BSCF) cells in 500-700 degrees C with humidified hydrogen as fuel and air as oxidant.
Titulo: Electrostatic Spray Deposition of Doped Ceria Films

Sentencas: The results show that a CGO film of 25 mu m thick obtained at a deposition temperature of 400 degrees C, a precursor solution flow rate of 6 ml h(-1) and a precursor concentration of 0.3 M was dense with very few isolated pores and the OCV of the associated cell was 0.915 V at 500 degrees C.
Titulo: Electrostatic Spray Deposition of Doped Ceria Films

Sentencas: This implies that the CGO film has negligible gas leakage and ESD is a promising method for preparing thin dense electrolyte films for SOFCs.
Titulo: Electrostatic Spray Deposition of Doped Ceria Films
